mapper.select: SELECT CUSTOMER.ID, CUSTOMER.NAME, CUSTOMER.SEX, CUSTOMER.AGE, CUSTOMER.BEDNUM as bedNum, CUSTOMER.HEIGHT, CUSTOMER.WEIGHT, CUSTOMER.BIRTHDAY, CUSTOMER.ATTENTION FROM CUSTOMER WHERE CUSTOMER.NAME = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER (CUSTOMER.ID, CUSTOMER.NAME, CUSTOMER.SEX, CUSTOMER.AGE, CUSTOMER.HEIGHT, CUSTOMER.WEIGHT, CUSTOMER.BIRTHDAY, CUSTOMER.ATTENTION) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{birthday}, #{attention})
mapper.update: UPDATE CUSTOMER SET CUSTOMER.NAME = #{name}, CUSTOMER.SEX = #{sex}, CUSTOMER.AGE = #{age}, CUSTOMER.HEIGHT = #{height}, CUSTOMER.WEIGHT = #{weight}, CUSTOMER.BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, CUSTOMER.ATTENTION = #{attention} WHERE CUSTOMER.ID = #{id}
